pages.text: $(li)The Riptide enchantment can be applied in a Trident.$(br)$(li)This enchantment allows the trident to launch you forwards while you are in contact with Water, this includes Rain.
pages.title: Riptide

pages.text: $(li)By default, it can be upgrade just until level III.$(br)$(li)You can raise the level IV of this enchantment using an Ancient Tome (Riptide).
